original_text: Some Pharisees and teachers of God's Law saw them there. So they said to Jesus' disciples, ‘You eat and drink with these bad people and with men who take taxes from people. That is not right.’
korean_text: 바리새인과 그들의 서기관들이 그 제자들을 비방하여 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 세리와 죄인과 함께 먹고 마시느냐

sentences.original_text: Some Pharisees and teachers of God's Law saw them there
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 바리새인들과 율법 선생들이 그들을 그곳에서 보았다

sentences.original_text: So they said to Jesus' disciples
You eat and drink with these bad people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 악한 사람들과 함께 먹고 마신다

sentences.original_text: and with men who take taxes from people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들에게 세금을 거두는 사람들과 함께
